alert.note: Alert for North Central (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Excessive Heat Warning issued June 26 at 4:35AM ADT until June 26 at 6:00PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heat index values above 112 degrees Fahrenheit. * WHERE...Urban and coastal areas of north central Puerto Rico, from Dorado to Arecibo. * WHEN...from 10 am to 5 pm AST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Heat exhaustion is likely with prolonged exposure. Heat stroke possible.
info.instruction: Take extra precautions, if you work or spend time outside. When possible, reschedule strenuous activities to early morning or evening. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Wear light weight and loose fitting clothing when possible and drink plenty of water. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.
